definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代文論是生命性文論，是一種整體有機結構觀。

sentences.english: It should also be admitted that his views are obviously narrow and limited.
sentences.chinese: 其詩學觀的褊狹也是顯而易見的。

sentences.english: My ideal match is a woman with a good sense of family.
sentences.chinese: 我的理想對象是要有好的家庭觀。
他們正在上海蔘觀訪問。

sentences.english: The science view is changing, forming technoscience view.
sentences.chinese: 它是科學觀的一次轉向，形成了技性科學觀。

sentences.english: The science view is changing, forming technoscience view.
sentences.chinese: 它是科學觀的一次轉向，形成了技性科學觀。

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly discusses Dingli's commercial literary view.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要論述了丁力的商情文學觀。

sentences.english: Can We Rely on Non-Christian Views of Justice?
sentences.chinese: 我們能依靠非基督教觀的法官？

sentences.english: Holy Spirit and Eschatology in Paul.
sentences.chinese: 保羅思想中的聖靈觀與末世論。

sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章側重於對古希臘人英雄觀與女性觀的質疑。

sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章側重於對古希臘人英雄觀與女性觀的質疑。

sentences.english: Practice-creation is the essence of Marx's freedom-living idea.
sentences.chinese: 實踐創生性是馬克思自由生存觀的本質。

sentences.english: Today I want to visit Changchun Taoist Temple and Guiyuan Temple.
sentences.chinese: 今天我想參觀長春觀和歸元寺。

sentences.english: The third part is about the main content of Mencius Ethnological Viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 第三章孟子民族觀主要內容。

sentences.english: This thesis is to analyze his theory of journalism occupation from the before-mentioned aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文將圍繞以上這幾個方面來討論他的新聞職業觀。

sentences.english: We summed these results into new viewpoints of the regional economics.
sentences.chinese: 我們將這些研究成果概括爲新區域經濟觀。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
